description: Guys don't get much better looking than Richie...and with such sex appeal he couldn't resist fooling around behind his girlfriend's back...not a good idea when that girl happens to be a dominatrix! Kendra wastes no time in restraining her philandering fuck-toy. He is whipped, spanked, given a zipper and finally fucked in the ass before he admits to having learnt his lesson.
title: Kendra James and Richie Rennt
